snippet.title: Kendo Rage (1993) [SNES] Complete Playthrough
snippet.description:
Playthrough of Kendo Rage, known in Japan as Makeruna! Makendō (負けるな!魔剣道, "Do Not Lose! Kendo Magic"),, Kendo Rage is not a great game but is elevated by its anime graphic style.

▶️ Subscribe for more videos:
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCCCmsDPICSz4MfC07fhoNAw?sub_confirmation=1

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/dangermeat
Instagram: https://instagram.com/danger_meat
Twitter: https://www.twitter.com/danger_meat
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@dangermeat

About the game:
Kendo Rage is an action video game for the Super Nintendo Entertainment System/Super Famicom by Datam Polystar. Seta U.S.A. published the English version.

The original Japanese version of the game stars a girl named Mai Tsurugino (剣野 舞, Tsurugino Mai). A spirit detective named Doro (ドロ) finds Mai and asks her to help him attack monsters.

In the English-language version of the game, an American girl named Josephine "Jo" goes to Japan to attend a summer kendo school. Her personal trainer, Osaki "Bob" Yoritomo, asks her to fight monsters on the way to school.

#snes #nintendo #playthrough #gaming #retro #walkthrough #longplay #gameplay
